name: M.O.T.H.E.R AI
description:
Researchers have created the ultimate evil: An AI that generates cooking recipes and it might have turned sentient. But of course nothing could go wrong... You get to test the ai and rate its performance all the while cooking up a delicious meal. It will even help you if you mess up a bit.

Use the Mouse to interact with the kitchen and cook the best meal ever... Lets hope you make M.O.T.H.E.R proud

Created in 4 days for the Wowie GameJam by a Team of 4 people.
